title: Ghislaine Maxwell Trial: When Will the Verdict Be Announced?
sub_head: The British socialite accused of conspiring with Jeffrey Epstein to sexually abuse underage girls has been on trial since late last month
body:
Ghislaine Maxwell, a British socialite who is accused of conspiring with Jeffrey Epstein to sexually abuse underage girls, has been on trial since late last month.
Ms. Maxwell, 59 years old, has pleaded not guilty. Her lawyers have argued she is a scapegoat for Epstein, who died in his jail cell in August 2019, about a month after his indictment on sex-trafficking charges. The New York City medical examiner ruled his death a suicide.
